description:
Customise your Portal Knights characters with this selection of joyful rings. Rings include:

- Butterfly Ring
- Rainbow Ring
- Flower Power Ring

Stand out from your friends with these great new effects to your character while exploring Elysia. Just equip these vanity rings to see it for yourself!

The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!
name: Portal Knights - Box of Joyful Rings
